title: sent a bug report, yet no response after 3 weeks.
body: don’t know if these are meant to be responded to but it was a pretty game breaking one thats been happening every 10-15 games to me. and it costed me most of them.

replies.body: Bug reports aren't meant to be responded to no, they're for Riot to track issues and how widespread they are, not to address individuals. Depending on the issue, it might be native to your client and a repair or reinstall will do the trick. Either way, if you want a response, you need to submit a support ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
